nodes.text: The Britarro were a mysterious sentient humanoid species that were native to Britaxis Minor. Nik Hepho was a Britarro who worked as a bounty hunter.
The Britarro were distinguished by their blue skin, flat noses and hairless heads.
The Britarros hailed from Britaxis Minor. Besides this, they were very mysterious.

A Britarro named Nik Hepho worked as a bounty hunter, specializing in tracking down adherents of the Church of the Force, an illegal religion within the Galactic Empire. He was seen on the moon of Jedha in Jedha City, shortly before the Death Star destroyed the city.

One Britarro was also seen in Chelli Aphra's squad in the Accresker Penal Legion. The Britarro was killed in an attack on an EF76 Nebulon-B escort frigate where it's hubdroid malfunctioned and exploded, killing all of the squad except Aphra and Lopset Yas.

The Britarro species first appeared in Rogue One: A Star Wars Story, directed by Gareth Edwards and released on December 15 2016. They were identified in Star Wars: Rogue One: The Ultimate Visual Guide, written by Pablo Hidalgo and released on December 16, 2016.
